include.label: in 3–4 sentences, describe how you use (or choose not to use) ai tools in your work."*"
include.value: I use AI tools to speed up everyday tasks like code scaffolding refactoring and writing tests while still reviewing everything carefully before it reaches production. For example AI has helped me quickly refactor large React components and identify edge cases during performance optimization. I choose not to rely on AI for core system design security sensitive logic or final architectural decisions where context and judgment matter most. I see AI as a support tool rather than a replacement for engineering responsibility.

include.label: react experience"*"
include.value: I have 6+ years of hands-on experience building and maintaining large React applications in production. I work extensively with hooks context API and state management to create reusable components and shared libraries. I also focus on performance accessibility and clean architecture while working closely with design and product teams.
